body.p:
To configure the MathML editor of the Author mode, go to
Options Preferences Editor Edit modes Author MathML
Window Preferences <oXygen/> Editor Edit Modes / Pages Author MathML . You can configure the following parameters:

ul.li: Equation minimum font size - the minimum size of the font used for rendering mathematical symbols;
MathFlow installation directory - the installation folder where looks for MathFlow Components (the MathFlow SDK);
MathFlow license file - the license for MathFlow Components (the MathFlow SDK);

MathFlow preferred editor - a MathML formula can be edited in one of three editors of the MathFlow Components (MathFlow SDK): structure editor, style editor, and simple editor. More documentation is available on the MathFlow SDKwebsite.
